name: Add a new book
description:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
  as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.
descriptionHtml:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
And I have some unique data of a book
When I add a new book to the bookstore

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1786222987, title=Blood's a Rover, description=Eos hic ratione vitae., pageCount=77, excerpt=Commodi distinctio itaque. Officia voluptatum veritatis quas. Magnam quos ducimus quisquam. Enim est corporis assumenda nam rerum. Et recusandae eaque repellendus laborum., publishDate=2025-09-21T04:10:47.041172988Z]

steps.name: Then I see a confirmation that the book was added
And the book details include the standard information expected in the bookstore
steps.statusMessage:
